messages.message: In a critical situation so appreciate a quick response:  I am using 23.07 and was planning to create a token for the addition of users. Looking through Admin it seems tokens for user creation are not available. Is there a way to get that option back?
@Dale DeLoy that option is still there on 23.07
the sign up tokens menu is not available in 23.10 - sorry looks like my sandbox is 23.10 and not 23.07
hmm i see the setting there on prod. Could it be a permission issue on your sandbox? You may need to be a site admin to see that item in the menu
@Xindi Xu how can one re-enable this? Is it an env var in api-server

I have collected all the personal emails from the users in the workshop so I can create users for them and not have their password emails be blocked by their corporate email services.  So - no longer an issue for my workshop today
Yea, we have to tweak the env var. `SITE_SETTING_DISABLE_SIGNUP` in api-server, apps-server, and webapp
@Xindi Xu where was this communicated? that this would be disabled moving forward for all new deployments
This feature (disable sign-up token and only allow admin to create accounts for the users) was shipped as part of the SaaS enablement back in March/April (?). cc @hannah @Heymian
It is now appearing in sandbox deployments, at least mine.  We need the parameters and process to change behavior documented.
I believe there are some updates made to the sandbox deployment pipeline. If the deployment pipeline by default set deployment to SaaS mode, this would happen. @peter may have more info
all sandboxes on sandbox.console are in saas mode now. we can look into changing this by default (incl disabling 2fa) for POV envs
I think just an easy way for the field to know how to disable the elements would be good enough. I can let the groups know
